B) Watch execution. Approve decisions. Ship faster.
C) One live dashboard for agentic work

Section: What you get (scan bullets)
- Activity Timeline: a real-time feed of agent work with threaded session views.
- Decisions: pending approvals with inline approve/reject so work keeps moving.
- Mission Control: initiatives, workstreams, milestones, and tasks in one place.
- Reliability: buffered outbox + replay visibility so you do not lose the execution story.

Onboarding panel copy (tight):
Headline: Connect your workspace
Subhead: Orchestrate agents, approve decisions, and track progress from a single live dashboard.
Primary button: Connect OrgX
Secondary button: Use API key
Tertiary links: Explore demo dashboard | Continue offline | Setup guide

Error state copy:
- Could not connect. Check pairing status or try API key.
- Retry

Success toast copy:
- Connected. Live session stream is now active.

1/ Shipping agentic work without a command center is chaos: runs go dark, approvals get lost, and plans drift.

2/ OrgX Live is a single dashboard inside OpenClaw that shows what agents are doing right now.

3/ You get an Activity Timeline (threaded sessions), Mission Control for initiatives, and a Decisions queue with inline approve/reject.

4/ The best part: reliability. Offline events buffer + replay so you keep the full execution story.

5/ Setup is low friction: install the plugin, open /orgx/live, then connect via browser pairing or paste an API key.

6/ Want to look first? Explore the demo dashboard, then connect when ready.

Try it: open http://127.0.0.1:18789/orgx/live

If you are running agents in production (or even just shipping with them daily), you need one thing: a live command center.

OrgX Live (inside OpenClaw) gives you a single dashboard for agentic execution:
- Activity Timeline with threaded sessions
- Mission Control for initiatives, workstreams, milestones, and tasks
- Decisions queue with inline approve/reject
- Offline buffering + replay visibility for reliable timelines

Local-first setup: install the plugin, open /orgx/live, then connect via pairing or API key.

If you want to see it before you connect, the demo dashboard is built in.

What would you want on your agent mission control screen first: decisions, progress, or run timelines?

Subject options: Your OrgX Live dashboard is ready | Get a live command center for your agents

Body snippet:
OpenClaw + OrgX now has a live dashboard at /orgx/live. You can watch execution in real time, approve decisions inline, and track progress across initiatives without losing the thread.

If you are not ready to connect yet, start in demo mode and get familiar with the surfaces. When you are ready, connect via pairing (recommended) or paste an API key from useorgx.com.

PS: Offline? No problem. Events buffer and replay so your activity timeline stays complete.
